thread.title: Ground News - OpenAI admits GPT-4 can help make bioweapons, but only a little bit
thread.title_full: Ground News - OpenAI admits GPT-4 can help make bioweapons, but only a little bit

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - OpenAI admits GPT-4 can help make bioweapons, but only a little bit
text: OpenAI admits GPT-4 can help make bioweapons, but only a little bit Summary by Ground News [OpenAI](https://ground.news/interest/openai_9d7a14)conducted a study with 100 human participants with 50 biology experts with PhDs and professional wet lab experience. The company concluded that GPT-4 provides at most a mild uplift in biological threat creation accuracy. OpenAI did add that bioweapon information is already widely available on the internet, and that its model does not significantly increase risk. 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Coverage Details Total News Sources0Leaning Left0Leaning Right0Center0Last Updated18 minutes agoBias Distribution No sources with tracked biases.
